name: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! Kibou no Meikyuu to Tsudoishi Boukensha-tachi! Plus - Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:
- Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! Kibou no Meikyuu to Tsudoishi Boukensha-tachi! Plus
- Code for download a costume (female character's swimsuit)
- Water-resistant Clear Case
- Cool Towel
